name: Goo vs goblins
description:
WASD to move. Space to spawn a new unit. F to explode. Drag and drop with mouse to combine units!

Controll a big goo, that's trying to harvest blood energy from the living!

Unit Types:

Worker - can harvest bloodrock

Swordsman - excells in melee combat

Marksman - ranged unit

Piker - good against armored enemies

Healer - heals your units

Tank - taunt's nearby enemies, and receives less damage

Combine your units to get new ones! 

This game was made in Bevy engine for Bevy Jam 2!
All art and sound assets were made during the jam!
